title: Christmas panettone
ingredients: ['500g plain flour', '6g dried active baking yeast', '240ml warm milk', '60ml vegetable oil', '2 eggs', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '40 drops panettone essence (about 1/2 teaspoon)', '80g raisins', '80g chopped prunes', '80g chopped dried apricots', '80g mixed peel', 'melted butter, as needed']
